posts.content:
Well i didn't expect that half way thro
,neck and neck all the way,
quite right tho, two very different buses,the voteing proves just how diverse peoples tastes are
.I don't think you were given sympathy votes Nick,Its down to taste.
i love all buses,shiney and well used,with the shiney one i honestly dont feel comfortable driving it,So i got myself another to rag about in .
Anyway enough rabbiting on,
Big thanks to all who voted for both buses,good fun and exciting,so close there is no losers.
Cheers Tony C
